description: Displays a list of products from catalog or manual selection

UseProductCatalog.description: Enable to automatically list all products from catalog

PreSelectedCategory.description: Optional: Enter exact category path (e.g., 'Fashion/Apparel' or 'Electronics/Smartphones'). Leave empty to show all products. Only works when 'Use Product Catalog' is enabled

ListedProducts.description: Manually add GenericProduct blocks (used when Product Catalog is disabled)
